remarks: A division ring is a ring in which ` 1 =/= 0 ` and every nonzero element is invertible.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)
statement:

isdivrng1.4 $e |- X = ran G $.
isdivrng2.5 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
